text:
Do vaccines against pneumonia protect you against the new coronavirus?

NO.

Here are @WHO myth-busters on the #coronavirus. Get your facts right: https://t.co/B11surbjPf

#2019nCoV https://t.co/VqYNpa43eT

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: MythBusters
entity.description: So exactly how hard is it to find a needle in a haystack, anyway? And can water dripping on your forehead really drive you nuts? Those are the kinds of questions, myths and urban legends that are put to the test in this humorous series that seeks to find out which myths are true and which are not.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks
